Poetic Translation: My end is my beginning part,
And my beginning is my end.

Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: And throughout it holds true at heart.
My end is my beginning part.

Lyrics: Mes tiers chans trois fois seulement
Poetic Translation: My third part three times has its start;
My end is my beginning part,
And my beginning is my end.
